name: Category Restriction WooCommerce
author: themelocation

sections.description:
This Plugin performs following functions. Developed by themelocation

1- If Product Added from Category A then Other Categories Products will not be added
2- It limits purchases of products to just one Category.

Main function of this plugin is once you added a product from One category; You can not purchase product from any other category.
This Plugin Works Well for Delivery business and Restaurants.

This plugin works on All Store Categories once you have installed and activated. This plugin by default enabled the functionality.

If you have any Questions, Contact Plugin Support
sections.installation:
1. From the Dashboard:
  2. Plugins
  3. Add New
  4. Search “Category Restriction WooCommerce”
  5. Install Now
  6. Activate
  7. Go to Settings -> Category Restriction WooCommerce
